definition: to gaze afar/to look into the distance
far/distant/remote/(intensifier in a comparison) by far/much (lower etc)
full moon/to hope/to expect/to visit/to gaze (into the distance)/to look towards/towards
as far as the eye can see

sentences.english: A sea of troubles, nothing moving part, the sand beach also is bad.
sentences.chinese: 遠望了一下海，沒有什麼動人之處，沙灘的沙也不好。

sentences.english: Year in and year out, coir raincoat and bamboo hat keep searching by raising their heads and looking far ahead.
sentences.chinese: 江南的蓑衣和竹笠經年地尋找，在遠遠的翹首遠望。

sentences.english: Achton waited, looking out at the array of defenses beyond Styrling’s walls.
sentences.chinese: 阿克通等待着，遠望着斯蒂爾林牆後的防禦部署。

sentences.english: If you strain your eyes, you can see the lake far away.
sentences.chinese: 如果你極目遠望，你能看見遠方的湖。

sentences.english: Peach Blossom Red than the fire is also red , Just like a burning flame from afar.
sentences.chinese: 桃花紅得比火還紅，遠遠望去像一團燃燒的火焰。

sentences.english: In imagination, she looked into the promised land .
sentences.chinese: 她在想象中遠望到“應許之地”。

sentences.english: From afar, the car by the island resembles a ship mooring landing ships.
sentences.chinese: 遠遠望去，車由島酷似一艘錨泊的登陸艦。

sentences.english: The dome of St. Paul Cathedral is well known in the world.
sentences.chinese: 這條街的盡頭是個大教堂，遠遠望去非常好看。

sentences.english: Far in the distance lies the Dongting Lake, a vast expanse of misty, rolling waters.
From afar, like a static painting, forever in my heart.
sentences.chinese: 遠遠望去，像幅靜止的油畫，久久地印在我的心裏。

sentences.english: From the mountain Lenny can look off across the valley.
sentences.chinese: 雷尼可以從那座山遠望谷間遠處的那邊。

sentences.english: When I looked at her, I even found her a cigaret smoker.
sentences.chinese: 練習的時候我遠遠望去，居然發現她還吸菸。

sentences.english: The top view, Taylor's plain, Wen River flow, take in everything in a glance.
sentences.chinese: 山頂遠望，泰萊平原，汶河西流，一覽無餘。

sentences.english: Achton waited, looking out at the array of defenses beyond Styrling's walls.
sentences.chinese: 阿克通等待着，遠望着斯蒂爾林牆後的防禦部署。

sentences.english: The boy's dorm was just beside the playground. Yimin saw a silhouette of human over there.
sentences.chinese: 男生宿舍就在操場邊上，遠遠望去有個人影站在路口。
